## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                      | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `selected` | `selected` | Indicates if the item is currently active. This will be set dynamically by the parent `listbox`. | `boolean` | `false` |
